name: bs-platform
description: bucklescript compiler, ocaml standard libary by bucklescript and its required runtime support

scripts.preinstall: ocamlopt.opt -g -inline 100 -linkall  -I +compiler-libs -I bin ocamlcommon.cmxa ocamlbytecomp.cmxa bin/compiler.mli bin/compiler.ml -o bin/bsc || echo 'check your compiler version if it is correct'
